Title: Overcoming the Initial Struggles in Xiaohongshu
Content: Starting on Xiaohongshu can be challenging, especially for beginners. The initial phase, often referred to as the 'dark period,' involves creating content with little to no engagement. This can be disheartening, but it is a phase that every new user must go through. The key to overcoming this period is to maintain a positive mindset and lower your expectations. Understand that success on Xiaohongshu requires preparation and persistence. Focus on creating content consistently without worrying too much about immediate results. Treat your first few posts as practice and learning opportunities. By doing so, you reduce the mental strain and avoid the frustration that comes with unmet expectations. Remember, even successful influencers like Li Jiaqi went through similar struggles before achieving fame. Therefore, prepare yourself mentally for this phase, and keep pushing forward with your content creation efforts.

Title: Focusing on Core Activities for Growth
Content: To grow effectively on Xiaohongshu, it is crucial to focus on core activities that drive results. During the initial stages, your primary focus should be on creating and posting high-quality content. Avoid getting distracted by other activities such as extensive marketing or managing multiple platforms. Concentrate on developing engaging posts, whether they are images, videos, or text. Break down the content creation process into manageable tasks like topic selection, writing, shooting, and editing. By dedicating your time and energy to these core activities, you increase your chances of producing content that resonates with your audience. Additionally, regularly review and refine your content strategy based on feedback and performance metrics. This focused approach not only helps in building a strong foundation but also ensures that you are making the most of your limited resources and time.
